price: 17. Is degene die schept gelijk aan degene die niet schept? Zullen jullie niet nadenken dan?
arabic: أَفَمَن يَخۡلُقُ كَمَن لَّا يَخۡلُقُۚ أَفَلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: afaman yakhluqu kaman lā yakhluqu afalā tadhakkarūna
